meanings: (기차역) (train) station, railroad[railway] station, stop; (규모가 작은) (Am) (railroad) depot

vlive.korean: '로데오역'은 진짜 연습생 때부터 지금까지의 심정... "Rodeo Station" is about when I was a trainee and up until now. 듣기 View video EXO : EXO-SC 세훈&찬열 '10억뷰' 인터뷰 with 개코 (Ơ3Ơ)👍🏻 (⊼⌔⊼)👍🏻
vlive.english: "Rodeo Station" is about when I was a trainee and up until now.

examples.korean: Commuters came pouring out of the station. 발음듣기 역에서 통근자들이 쏟아져 나오고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Commuters came pouring out of the station. 발음

examples.korean: We’re handily placed for the train station. 발음듣기 우리는 그 기차역을 이용하기에 편리한 위치에 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’re handily placed for the train station. 발음

examples.korean: I get off at the next station. 발음듣기 저는 다음 역에서 내려요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I get off at the next station. 발음

examples.korean: He won a BAFTA for the role. 발음듣기 그는 그 역으로 바프타 상을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He won a BAFTA for the role. 발음

examples.korean: Can I give you a ride to the station? 발음듣기 내가 역까지 태워다 줄까? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can I give you a ride to the station? 발음
